name: HipArthroplasty
title: Hip arthroplasty
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping of value sets identifies patients who have a procedure of a hip arthroplasty.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a hip arthroplasty procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent hip arthroplasty procedures.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM, ICD10PCS or SNOMED-CT.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
